dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: —I mean, saving a hostage at Almaty International Airport, right? Just, wow.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: -I mean, saving a hostage at Almaty International Airport, right? Just, wow.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The president has awarded the Kazakh citizen who saved a hostage at Almaty International Airport.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Musa Abdraim, he just, like, neutralized the attacker. Incredible!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Musa Abdraim, he just, like, neutralized the attacker. Incredible!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, the Head of State praised the courage and quick thinking of Musa Abdraim, who neutralized the attacker, and instructed that he be presented with a state award.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And the president actually awarded him! A state award, for courage and quick thinking.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the president actually awarded him! A state award, for courage and quick thinking.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The president has awarded the Kazakh citizen who saved a hostage at Almaty International Airport. Earlier, the Head of State praised the courage and quick thinking of Musa Abdraim, who neutralized the attacker, and instructed that he be presented with a state award.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, for sure! The 'For Courage' medal. I mean, can you imagine?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, for sure! The 'For Courage' medal. I mean, can you imagine?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: By decree of the Head of State, for bravery and selflessness shown in an extreme situation, Musa Sayranbaiuly Abdraim has been awarded the 'For Courage' medal,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! A 67-year-old man, right, just grabs this female security officer by the hair—
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! A sixty seven-year-old man, right, just grabs this female security officer by the hair-
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: When aviation security officers asked him to present his documents, he grabbed a female security officer by the hair and threatened her with a knife. ... The attacker has been identified as a 67-year-old man.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: With a knife! Uh, threatening her, in the pre-flight security check area!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: With a knife! Uh, threatening her, in the pre-flight security check area!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The hostage situation occurred on March 7 in the pre-flight security check area of the domestic terminal (T1). ... he grabbed a female security officer by the hair and threatened her with a knife.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, with a knife! And then Musa, this 52-year-old guy, steps in, disarms him.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, with a knife! And then Musa, this fifty two-year-old guy, steps in, disarms him.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It should be noted that the hero who disarmed the attacker at Almaty airport and saved the hostage was 52-year-old Musa Abdraim.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: In, like, seven minutes! Seven whole minutes of that situation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: In, like, seven minutes! Seven whole minutes of that situation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Seven minutes later, the man was disarmed by officers from the airport™s security service and the transport police.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? That's what stuck with me. Seven minutes of pure tension.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? That's what stuck with me. Seven minutes of pure tension.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And his quote! "As a man and citizen of Kazakhstan, I could not have acted differently."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And his quote! As a man and citizen of Kazakhstan, I could not have acted differently.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "As a man and citizen of Kazakhstan, I could not have acted differently" - Hero from Almaty airport

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that just hits you, doesn't it? Like, that's just who he is.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that just hits you, doesn't it? Like, that's just who he is.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly! It's not even a question for him. Just pure, uh, instinct.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly! It's not even a question for him. Just pure, uh, instinct.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Incredible bravery, really. Just, like, a true hero.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Incredible bravery, really. Just, like, a true hero.
